snippet.title: [Homebrew] Logic Island, my puzzle game for the Game Boy
snippet.description:
Gameplay showcase of Logic Island, my puzzle game for the Game Boy.

Logic Island is a logic game, inspired by 'Nurikabe' (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nurikabe_(puzzle)), one of my favorite games. In my version, I tried to use more elaborate graphics than a simple grid.
